Package com.cmput301f23t28.casacatalog.models

Class Item

java.lang.Object
com.cmput301f23t28.casacatalog.models.Item
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Item extends Object implements Serializable
Represents an item with various properties such as name, price, tags, and more. This class implements Serializable, allowing its instances to be serialized for storage or transmission.
See Also:
